name: Mutual Non-Disclosure Agreement
description: Standard terms for a mutual NDA allowing two parties to share confidential information while protecting it from disclosure. Covers permitted use, exceptions, term, return/destruction of information, and governing law.

name: Mutual Non-Disclosure Agreement - Cover Page
description: Fillable cover page template for the Common Paper Mutual NDA. Parties complete this document with the purpose, effective date, term, governing law, and signatures to execute the MNDA.

name: Cloud Service Agreement
description: Comprehensive agreement for selling and buying cloud software and SaaS products. Covers service access, restrictions, privacy, payment, term, warranties, liability, indemnification, and confidentiality.

name: Service Level Agreement
description: Agreement defining uptime and response time commitments for cloud services. Covers target uptime calculation, service credits, remedies, and termination rights for repeated SLA failures.

name: Design Partner Agreement
description: Agreement for giving a partner early access to a product in exchange for structured feedback. Covers program participation, product improvement rights, IP ownership, confidentiality, and termination.

name: Professional Services Agreement
description: Agreement for engaging a provider to perform professional services under statements of work. Covers deliverables, IP assignment, payment, warranties, indemnification, confidentiality, and insurance.

name: Data Processing Agreement
description: Agreement establishing GDPR-compliant obligations for processing personal data. Covers processor/subprocessor relationships, processing instructions, restricted transfers (EEA SCCs, UK Addendum), security incidents, and audit rights.

name: Partnership Agreement
description: Agreement for formalizing co-marketing and business partnership arrangements. Covers partner obligations, trademark licensing, payment, escalation procedures, indemnification, and confidentiality.

name: Software License Agreement
description: Agreement for licensing on-premise or installed software products. Covers license grant, restrictions, open source software, updates, payment, term, warranties, liability caps, and indemnification.

name: Pilot Agreement
description: Short-term agreement for a customer to evaluate a product before committing to a full commercial contract. Covers pilot access, evaluation purposes, restrictions, liability, confidentiality, and termination.

name: Business Associate Agreement
description: HIPAA-compliant agreement governing the handling of protected health information (PHI) by a business associate. Covers permitted uses, safeguards, subcontractors, breach notification, and audit rights.

name: AI Addendum
description: Addendum to supplement existing agreements when AI/ML services are part of the product offering. Covers AI service usage, model training restrictions, IP ownership of inputs and outputs, and AI-specific disclaimers.
